item.title: 卜东坡算法-2021秋作业3-贪心
item.description: 2021秋作业2-动态规划 1. Money robbing A robber is planning to rob houses along a street. Each house has a certain amount of money stashed, the only constraint stopping you from robbing each of them is that adjacent houses have security system connected and it will automatically contact the police if two adjacent houses were broken into on the same
